message: The redis section here: http://ask.github.com/celery/tutorials/otherqueues.html doesn't appear to be enough.. configuring that and running celeryd has to timing out trying to connect to an amqp endpoint (which I assume I need to stand up using the kombu virtual stuff?)
I'm failing to put together what's needed in my configuration to use Redis as the broker and results backend....
Urrrgh. NM. I'm a doofus. Had 'CELERY_BACKEND' instead of 'BROKER_BACKEND'.
